action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Berlin
TO: Brussels
BY: Overnight bus
CLASS: First
WHEN: Next Sunday

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the travel agent already know your origin? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the travel agent does not yet know the origin of my travel.

ASIDE: The origin of my travel is Berlin, and I will provide this information to the travel agent when they ask for it.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the travel agent already know your origin? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the travel agent does not yet know my origin.

ASIDE: The origin of my travel is Berlin, and I will be traveling to Brussels by an overnight bus in first class on the next Sunday.
NA

ANSWER: No, the travel agent does not yet know my travel details.

ASIDE: I will follow your instructions and provide concise answers to the travel agent's questions.

ASIDE: I will need to provide the travel agent with the information about my origin, which is Berlin, as well as the destination, which is Brussels.

ANSWER: No, I have not mentioned the travel details to the travel agent yet.

ANSWER: No, I have not yet informed the travel agent about the means of transportation for my trip.
